divs: Sighting DetailsI saw several blinking lights changing color. the one that was the closest was easy to see color variation and pulsating through telescope. I video taped the object and took still shots with my camera through scope. the craft moved in the same area very fast as lights left haze around the triangle shape. this ship glowed vibrantly.
